knimeNode.name: Molecule Widget (Labs)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Emits a molecule string in the specified format.

intro.p: Emits a molecule string in the specified format. The molecule can also be sketched or its string representation be edited.

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in the view.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the view, for instance by means of a tooltip.
The format of the molecule string. The supported formats are determined by the molecule sketcher configured in the respective preference page.
The value that is selected by default.

ports.outPort: Variable output comprising string variables for the molecule and its format.
